FileSystemWrite_writeFile.name: FileSystemWrite_writeFile
FileSystemWrite_writeFile.description: Writes to a file. If the file exists it will overwrite the contents. This will create any parent directories required,

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: The file path (either full filesystem path or relative to current working directory)

parameters.name: contents
parameters.description: The contents to write to the file

parameters.name: allowOverwrite
parameters.description: If the filePath already exists, then it will overwrite or throw an error based on the allowOverwrite property

FileSystemWrite_editFileContents.name: FileSystemWrite_editFileContents
FileSystemWrite_editFileContents.description: Reads a file, then transforms the contents using a LLM to perform the described changes, then writes back to the file.

parameters.name: descriptionOfChanges
parameters.description: A natual language description of the changes to make to the file contents

FileSystemWrite_patchEditFile.name: FileSystemWrite_patchEditFile
FileSystemWrite_patchEditFile.description: Edits a file using a search and replace. Provide the minimal lines of text from the file contents as the unique search string.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The lines of text in the file to replace. Note that all the whitespace must be identical.

parameters.name: replace
parameters.description: The new text to use as a replacement
